Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Samuel, <S%H8050><s%> "Behold, <S%H6213><s%> I will do a thing <S%H1697><s%> in Israel, <S%H3478><s%> at which both <S%H8147><s%> the ears <S%H241><s%> of everyone who hears <S%H8085><s%> it shall tingle. <S%H6750><s%>

Samuel <S%H8050><s%> grew, <S%H1431><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was with him, <S%H1697><s%> and let none of his words fall <S%H5307><s%> to the ground. <S%H776><s%>
